mdRecord.dcterms:description: One graffiti demands that people stop writing on the furniture; a second graffiti charges this one with hypocrisy. Another proclaims a desire for a boyfriend. [work]
Student graffiti art and messages inscribed on carrel walls in the new stacks, Alderman Library, University of Virginia, prior to the renovation of the building, 2020-2023. [host]
